LanguageData.DebugMenu_TweakValues: Open TweakValues menu.\n\nThis lets you change internal values.
LanguageData.DebugMenu_DebugActions: Open debug actions menu.\n\nThis lets you spawn items and force various events.
LanguageData.DebugMenu_ViewSettings: Open the view settings.\n\nThis lets you see special debug visuals.
LanguageData.DebugMenu_Inspector: Open the inspector.\n\nThis lets you inspect what's happening in the game, down to individual variables.
LanguageData.DebugMenu_DevPalette: Toggle the dev palette.\n\nAllows you to setup a palette of debug actions for ease of use.
LanguageData.DebugMenu_GodMode: Toggle god mode.\n\nWhen god mode is on, you can build stuff instantly, for free, and deconstruct things that aren't yours.
